section.p: The template supports the collection of findings derived from physical exams, other than vital signs.

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:618)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:619)

SHALL contain [1..2] id (CONF:620)
A value that is provided to ensure the uniqueness of the physical exam finding. [SDTM: PESEQ, PESPID] A single identifier, the sequence number, is required.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:621), where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet Physical Exam Finding Set locally defined STATIC (CONF:1535)
A coded value that identifies the physical exam finding. The verbatim text is placed within the original text property of the CD data type. [SDTM: PETESTCD, PETEST]

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] statusCode (CONF:623), where the @code SHALL be selected from (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus) (CONF:1536)
Used to indicate whether or not the specified physical exam has been performed. [SDTM: PESTAT]

SHOULD contain [0..2] value (CONF:624)
The result of the component of the physical exam indicated by the code value, captured as one or two observations. Verbatim findings are captured in orginal text. A result or finding in standard format should be recorded as a base value - either code or physical quantity. A modified reported term is included as a translation. [SDTM: PEMODIFY, PEORRES, PEORESU, PESTRESC]

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entryRelationship (CONF:625)
Identifies the SDTM or SEND domain the record is assigned to.
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Contains exactly one [1..1] Domain Assignment (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.30)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:626)
Allows capture of a group identifier for the finding.
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Group Identifier (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.42)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] methodCode (CONF:627), where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet Method C85492 STATIC (CONF:628)
The method used for conducting the test or examination. [SDTM: PEMETHOD]

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] targetSiteCode (CONF:629), where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet Anatomical Location C74456 STATIC (CONF:630)
Can be used to specify where a physical exam finding occurred. [SDTM: PELOC]

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:631)
Information on whether a predefined data item was collected, and the timing of collection.
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Data Collection (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.27)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:632)
Provides a reason for not capturing information for the finding.
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Non Performance Reason (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.56)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] participant (CONF:633)
Used to record the role played by the person providing the value of a subjective finding.
Contains exactly one [1..1] Study Finding Evaluator (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.84)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:634)
Allows identification of the relevant body system or organ class.
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Body System or Organ Class (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.17)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:635)
The record of a category to be used in organizing information items.
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Category (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.20)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:636)
The record of a sub-category to be used in organizing information items.
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Sub- Category (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.91)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship (CONF:637)
Establishes a relationship between this record and another record.
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Contains exactly one [1..1] Related Record (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.75)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship (CONF:638)
Allows the association of a supplemental value - outside of the content specfied for the domain - to the record.
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Supplemental Value (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.96)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship (CONF:639)
A place to insert comments related to a particular finding.
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Comment (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.23)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship (CONF:640)
Allows recording of additional findings related to the finding.
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Finding About (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.40)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:618)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:619)

SHALL contain [1..2] id (CONF:620)
A value that is provided to ensure the uniqueness of the physical exam finding. [SDTM: PESEQ, PESPID] A single identifier, the sequence number, is required.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:621), where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet Physical Exam Finding Set locally defined STATIC (CONF:1535)
A coded value that identifies the physical exam finding. The verbatim text is placed within the original text property of the CD data type. [SDTM: PETESTCD, PETEST]

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] statusCode (CONF:623), where the @code SHALL be selected from (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus) (CONF:1536)
Used to indicate whether or not the specified physical exam has been performed. [SDTM: PESTAT]

SHOULD contain [0..2] value (CONF:624)
The result of the component of the physical exam indicated by the code value, captured as one or two observations. Verbatim findings are captured in orginal text. A result or finding in standard format should be recorded as a base value - either code or physical quantity. A modified reported term is included as a translation. [SDTM: PEMODIFY, PEORRES, PEORESU, PESTRESC]

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] methodCode (CONF:627), where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet Method C85492 STATIC (CONF:628)
The method used for conducting the test or examination. [SDTM: PEMETHOD]

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] targetSiteCode (CONF:629), where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet Anatomical Location C74456 STATIC (CONF:630)
Can be used to specify where a physical exam finding occurred. [SDTM: PELOC]

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entryRelationship (CONF:625)
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Contains exactly one [1..1] Domain Assignment (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.30)
Identifies the SDTM or SEND domain the record is assigned to.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:626)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Group Identifier (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.42)
Allows capture of a group identifier for the finding.

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:631)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Data Collection (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.27)
Information on whether a predefined data item was collected, and the timing of collection.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:632)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Non Performance Reason (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.56)
Provides a reason for not capturing information for the finding.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] participant (CONF:633)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Study Finding Evaluator (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.84)
Used to record the role played by the person providing the value of a subjective finding.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:634)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Body System or Organ Class (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.17)
Allows identification of the relevant body system or organ class.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:635)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Category (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.20)
The record of a category to be used in organizing information items.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:636)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Sub- Category (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.91)
The record of a sub-category to be used in organizing information items.

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship (CONF:637)
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Contains exactly one [1..1] Related Record (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.75)
Establishes a relationship between this record and another record.

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship (CONF:638)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Supplemental Value (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.96)
Allows the association of a supplemental value - outside of the content specfied for the domain - to the record.

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship (CONF:639)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Comment (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.23)
A place to insert comments related to a particular finding.

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship (CONF:640)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Finding About (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.40)
Allows recording of additional findings related to the finding.
